amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Rural Community Advancement Program account by $5 millon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for Rural Community Advancement Program account by $5 millon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Butterfield.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
